mapper.sql: ACCT_ID, ENT_ID, LOGIN_SOURCE, ACCT_TITLE, ACCT_PASSWORD, ACCT_CODE, NAME, DEPT, MOBILE_PHONE, EMAIL, REGISTER_TIME, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, IS_DELETE, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, STATUS, START_TIME, ENT_TIME, A_COMPANY_ID,O_INFO_ID,O_INFO_NAME,ACCT_TYPE
mapper.select:
select
from acct_info where ACCT_ID = #{acctId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_delete = 0

select
from acct_info a where a.O_INFO_ID=#{oInfoId} and a.is_delete = 0
and a.ACCT_TYPE = #{acctType}
and a.ACCT_ID not in (#{acctId})

select * from acct_info a where a.ACCT_TITLE = #{acctTitle} and a.O_INFO_ID=#{oInfoId} and a.is_delete = 0
and a.ACCT_ID not in (#{acctId})
mapper.insert: insert into acct_info (ACCT_ID, ENT_ID, LOGIN_SOURCE, ACCT_TITLE, ACCT_PASSWORD, ACCT_CODE, NAME, DEPT, MOBILE_PHONE, EMAIL, REGISTER_TIME, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, IS_DELETE, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, STATUS, START_TIME, ENT_TIME, A_COMPANY_ID) values (#{acctId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{entId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{loginSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acctTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acctPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acctCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{entTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

mapper.update:
update acct_info
ENT_ID = #{entId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
LOGIN_SOURCE = #{loginSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCT_TITLE = #{acctTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCT_PASSWORD = #{acctPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCT_CODE = #{acctCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPT = #{dept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE_PHONE = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTER_TIME = #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_LOGIN_TIME = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_DELETE = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_TIME = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ENT_TIME = #{entTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
A_COMPANY_ID = #{aCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
O_INFO_ID = #{oInfoId},
ACCT_TYPE = #{acctType},
where ACCT_ID = #{acctId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update acct_info set ENT_ID = #{entId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LOGIN_SOURCE = #{loginSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCT_TITLE = #{acctTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCT_PASSWORD = #{acctPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCT_CODE = #{acctCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT = #{dept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE_PHONE = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGISTER_TIME = #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_LOGIN_TIME = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_DELETE = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_TIME = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ENT_TIME = #{entTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, A_COMPANY_ID = #{aCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where ACCT_ID = #{acctId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM role_info a LEFT JOIN acct_role_real b ON a.ROLE_ID =b.ROLE_ID LEFT JOIN acct_info c ON c.ACCT_ID =b.ACCT_ID WHERE b.ACCT_ID = #{acctId} and ORG_ID = #{orgId} and c.is_delete = 0

mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(O_INFO_ID) FROM acct_info WHERE 1 = 1 and is_delete = 0 AND O_INFO_ID IN
#{list}
SELECT * FROM `acct_info` WHERE ACCT_TITLE = #{acctTitle} and ACCT_PASSWORD = #{acctPassword} and is_delete = 0s

select * from acct_info a LEFT JOIN acct_role_real arr on arr.ACCT_ID=a.ACCT_ID LEFT JOIN role_info r on r.ROLE_ID=arr.ROLE_ID where r.ROLE_ID=#{roleId} and arr.ROLE_ID is not null and a.is_delete = 0

select a.acct_id,r.ROLE_TITLE,a.ACCT_TITLE from acct_info a LEFT JOIN acct_role_real arr on arr.ACCT_ID=a.ACCT_ID LEFT JOIN role_info r on r.ROLE_ID=arr.ROLE_ID where arr.ROLE_ID is not null and a.O_INFO_ID=#{orgId} and a.IS_DELETE = 0 and r.ROLE_ID in (select r.ROLE_ID from role_info r LEFT JOIN acct_role_purchase arp on arp.role_id=r.ROLE_ID where r.IS_DELETE = 0 and r.`STATUS`=1 and r.ORG_ID=#{orgId} and arp.PURCHASE_TYPE=#{purchaseType} and arp.role_id is not null ) AND a.ACCT_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{acctTitle},'%')
select *,acct_title as name,O_INFO_ID as orgId from acct_info where ACCT_TITLE = #{acctId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and is_delete=0
